title: Fight the Landlord, Fall in Love - Novel Updates
tags: Bickering Couple   Card Games   Complex Family Relationships   Confident Protagonist   Cooking   Couple Growth   Depression   Devoted Love Interests   Game Elements   Gamers   Glasses-wearing Love Interests   Handsome Male Lead   Inheritance   Manly Gay Couple   Marriage   Mature Protagonist   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Older Love Interests   Past Trauma   Phobias   Playful Protagonist   Power Couple   Smart Couple
author: Cang Wu Bin Bai   苍梧宾白
description:
​A love story that came about due to Fight The Landlord. [1]

Two eldest young masters who looked down on each other were forced into a blind date. Each discovered that the other was the immoral scoundrel who had poured cold water or thrown rotten tomatoes on him during a game of Fight The Landlord two days prior.

Now what?

Well, secure a partner first and figure the rest out later.

​

[1] popular Chinese card game with an online app version.>
